entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
